<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2765</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Learning Resource site at CBS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die erlernenhilfsmittelsite an CBS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le site d'étude de ressource au CBS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O local de aprendizagem do recurso no CBS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il luogo imparante delle risorse al CBS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η περιοχή των στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς εκμάθησης στην 
CBS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El sitio del recurso que aprende en el CBS</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Reading and writing Activities based on online news stories. Includes guidelines and lesson plans for instructors</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading texts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">auditory comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lese-und Schreibenaktivitäten basiert auf 
Onlinenachrichten Geschichten. Schließt Korrekturlinien und 
Lektionpläne für Ausbilder ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activités de lecture et d'écriture basées sur 
des histoires en ligne de nouvelles. Inclut des directives et 
des plans de leçon pour des instructeurs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividades da leitura e da escrita baseadas em 
histórias em linha da notícia. Inclui guidelines e plantas da 
lição para instrutores</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività di scrittura e della lettura basate 
sulle storia in linea di notizie. Include la guida di 
riferimento ed i programmi di lezione per gli istruttori</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δραστηριότητες ανάγνωσης και γραψίματος βασισμένες 
στις σε απευθείας σύνδεση ιστορίες ειδήσεων. Περιλαμβάνει 
τις οδηγίες και τα σχέδια μαθήματος για τους εκπαιδευτικούς</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Actividades de la lectura y de la escritura 
basadas en historias en línea de las noticias. Incluye guías 
de consulta y los planes de la lección para los instructores</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesetexte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gehörerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprachenfähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">textes de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension auditive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">capacités linguistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">textos da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão auditory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">habilidades de língua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">testi della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione uditiva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abilità di linguaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κείμενα ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γλωσσικές δεξιότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">habilidades de lenguaje</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
